Room.Name: Plasnelt Road
Room.ShortDescription: Plasnelt Road continues to the east and west.
Room.LongDescription: There are a number of small shops along here on the south side of the road. On the north side is an impressive building where a lot of noise can be heard. There are posters plastered all over the building's wall, and it looks like you could challenge a gladitor, if you wanted to.
